features: Introduced a dynamic updates page that showcases the latest downloaded charts seamlessly.
Enhanced deep link functionality for smoother navigation to opening levels.
Implemented a robust automatic updates system that ensures fetching works flawlessly across all scenarios.
Revamped background gradients to display colors in a vibrant and visually appealing order.

fixes.description: Fixed downloaded charts not being shown on ‘Updates’ page
Fixed opening levels throught deep links
Fixed automatic updates fetching not working on specific scenarios
Fixed background gradients not showing the colors in the correct order
